title: #285 How to Parent When Kids Constantly Change
itunes:title: #285 How to Parent When Kids Constantly Change
description:
Being with and loving and helping guide kids is a privilege, a challenge, and can be exhausting. What works today won’t work tomorrow. What works for this kid won’t work for that kid. What works for you when you have energy doesn’t work for you when you don’t. Today I want to offer some words about that shift and then offer two simple “start small” steps to begin connecting more with your kids.


Helpful Companion Links

  • 2022 Holiday Gift Guide
  • Download a transcript of this episode.



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
